amendment.description: To provide for a $150 billion revenue stimulus for fiscal years 2003 and 2004 without adding to the long-term debt.

vote.text: Amendment SA 397 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 37 - 62. Record Vote Number: 100.

action.text: Amendment SA 397 proposed by Senator Kerry. (consideration: CR S4366-4367; text: CR S4366-4367) To provide for a $150 billion revenue stimulus for fiscal years 2003 and 2004 without adding to the long-term debt.
